text:
East River, Queens shore, Astoria, showing several waterfront views. View 1 shows marble works and an old factory between 34th and 35th Avenues; view 2, the waterfront at the foot of Third Street, Halletts Cove, with the Sohmer piano factory appearing in the left background; and view 3, the foot of Steinway Street, looking north towards Rikers Island.

P. L. Sperr

View 1: April 3, 1933
View 2: June 12, 1935
View 3: June 3, 1927
title: East River - Shore and skyline - Queens shore - Astoria - [Sohmer and Company Pianos ; View of Queens waterfront.]
